data.message: Don't hate on trump until you hate on the dems that have ruined Detroit and the state of Michigan aswell. Life long fan but I can't support a unamerican rapper.

Fuck! Is not America the land of the fuckn free?? Let Em be Em!! Fuck!! I do not hate Trump! He´s better then any predident we had in Brazil for the last many, many years!!! But I Love Em!! He´s free to think, to say to wear what the fuck he wants!! I cant take anymore this shitty "fans" acting like Em was in the surfice of the earth to serve them and fill their personal needs!! "nhenhenhe, shave your beard, nhenhenhe, lose weigh, gain weigh, do this, do that, nhenhenhe, stop doing this, stop doing that!!" Leave him be, for Christ sake!! Don´t like him anymore?? You´re free too!!!!! Shut the fuck up and buy a Lil Wayne cd!! Stop hoping for Em to change his self to please you!! Who the fuck you think you are??? Go fuck yourselves!! Im pissed with this shit!! You hypocrite egocentrics motherfuckers!! You´re not even your assholes bosses!!! Fuck, fuck.
